column4: i'm running ubuntu 10.10 in virtualbox on my windows machine - do you recommend installing fluendo plugin?
what would you recommend i download as an alternative?
start up synaptic, go to settings->software sources
set the tickmark next to "software restricted by copyright or legal issues"
depends, are you a desktop or a command line person?
I use xchat , even though I'm a command line person....
and vim or emacs are ye olde famous editors
so do what the nice computer says (it means to remove the USB stick or CD)
